item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

yM = 60; is only 60 milliseconds. To make it 6 seconds, it must be 6000.

item.title: Making this timed yell work?
item.dc:creator: @I_james_I I james I
item.description:
@I_james_I wrote:

$$edit$$ fixed:

i did:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {
if(yM > 0)
sM(“You need wait “+yM+” to message again”);
}
String plrText = command.substring(5);
plrTextUpdateRequired = true;
if(yM == 0)
{
yell("["+playerName+"]:" +Character.toUpperCase(plrText.charAt(0)) + plrText.substring(1));
yM = 60;

} [/code]

Read full topic
